sourcesContent:
<template>
<
   <v-row
        align="center"
        class="mx-0"
      >
  <v-card class="cardA">
    
    <v-card-actions>
        
      <v-form ref="form" v-model="valid" lazy-validation>
        <v-text-field
          v-model="name"
          :rules="nameRules"
          label="Username"
          required
        ></v-text-field>

        <v-text-field
          v-model="password"
          :rules="passwordRules"
          label="Password"
          required
        ></v-text-field>

        <v-btn color="success" class="mr-4" router to="/AdminOne">
          Login
        </v-btn>
      </v-form>
      
    </v-card-actions>
  </v-card>
   </v-row>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: "HomeView",
  data: () => ({
    valid: true,
    name: "",
    nameRules: [
      (v) => !!v || "Name is required",
      (v) => (v && v.length <= 10) || "Name must be less than 10 characters",
    ],
    password: "",
    passwordRules: [
      (v) => !!v || "Password is required",
      (v) => /.+@.+\..+/.test(v) || "Password invalid",
    ],
  }),

  methods: {
    validate() {
      this.$refs.form.validate();
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style scoped>
.cardA {
    height: 30%;
    width: 40%;
}
</style>
